name: Theft Ward
text: You ward a single object in your possession against theft. You gain a +10 bonus on Perception checks to notice someone trying to take the object from you.
mythicText: Add your tier to the Perception check bonus. Add your tier to your CMD against disarm and steal combat maneuvers attempted against the item.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害, 物体)
text_zh: 你可以使你身上的单件物品难以被盗。你在发现有人尝试从你身上取走该物品的察觉检定上获得+10加值。
mythicText_zh: 将你的阶层加到察觉检定加值上。在对抗目标为物品的卸除武器与盗取战技检定时，将你的阶层加到你的CMD上。
